resource.name: FAQs
sampleUtterances: what can you do for me
I want to change the service

messages.content: Hi! Nice to see you. I am your online assistant. Here are a few examples of what you could say: ' I want to book an online course.' 'Cancel my order.' 'My order list'. Other services are also provided, here are some examples 'Get definition', 'Take a placement test.'
